content.description: Directions: You will now listen to several selections. Each selection will be followed by a series of spoken questions based on the content. During the pause, select the best answer to each question from among the four choices, and mark your answer.

choices.label: Ein Delphin griff sie plötzlich an.
Ein Hai begann mit ihr zu spielen.
Die Strömung zog sie unter Wasser.

content.answer: Die Strömung zog sie unter Wasser.

unit.text: 5: Factors That Impact the Quality of Life

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
